summary: Add 3 wearable pumpkin head for both male and female
descriptionHtml:
Add 3 wearable pumpkin head for both male and female, you can craft it under hide armor section or use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]AdditemMenu[/url] mod.

[b][u][i][color=#ff0000]Ver 2.0 add GO and less glossy head[/color][/i][/u][/b]

Image from [b]H_homura[/b] the original creator

[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/101/images/40446-2-1316756944.jpg[/img]

Permission notes:

This mod was originally made by humidukihomura AKA H.homura for Oblivion [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/40446/?]Here[/url]. I only converted this mod to Skyrim. all meshes and textures belong to the original creator. You must credit the original creator of this mod if you want to use his/her assets in your mod, no need to credit me.

Permission notes from the original creator mod page:
------------------------------------------------------------
4.Modification and re-distribution
You freely modify, and can re-distribute this MOD. 
Please attach the readme file without fail when distributing it, and write my name (H.homura). 
------------------------------------------------------------
